Interface CallableOnDNS

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
DNS, SocketClientManager
public interface CallableOnDNS extends Remote
Interface for DNS (Discovery and Naming Service) operations in the game. Provides methods for client-server communication, game management, and player registration. Extends Remote to enable RMI (Remote Method Invocation) functionality.

  • Method Details

    • getController

      GameController getController(String gameId) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the game controller for a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The unique identifier of the game
      Returns:
      The GameController associated with the specified game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs

    • getGameInfo

      GameInfo getGameInfo(String gameId) throws RemoteException
      Gets information about a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The unique identifier of the game
      Returns:
      GameInfo object containing information about the specified game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs

    • registerWithNickname

      boolean registerWithNickname(String nickname, CallableOnClientController controller) throws IOException
      Registers a player with the specified nickname and associates it with a client controller.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname to register
      controller - The client controller to associate with the nickname
      Returns:
      true if registration was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during registration

    • createGame

      GameInfo createGame(PlayerColor color, int numPlayers, boolean isTestFlight, String nickname) throws IOException
      Creates a new game with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - The color chosen by the creating player
      numPlayers - The maximum number of players allowed in the game
      isTestFlight - Whether the game is a test flight
      nickname - The nickname of the player creating the game
      Returns:
      GameInfo object with information about the created game
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during game creation

    • joinGame

      boolean joinGame(String gameId, String nickname, PlayerColor color) throws IOException
      Adds a player to an existing game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The unique identifier of the game to join
      nickname - The nickname of the player joining the game
      color - The color chosen by the joining player
      Returns:
      true if the player successfully joined the game, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the join operation

    • leaveGameBeforeCreation

      void leaveGameBeforeCreation(String nickname) throws IOException
      Removes a player from the game before it has been created/started.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to remove
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the leave operation

    • pingToServerFromClient

      void pingToServerFromClient(String nickname) throws IOException
      Sends a ping from the client to the server to check connection status.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the client sending the ping
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the ping operation

    • pongToServerFromClient

      void pongToServerFromClient(String nickname) throws IOException
      Sends a pong response from the client to the server, typically in response to a server ping.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the client sending the pong
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the pong operation
